description: The jury is discharged after failing to reach a verdict in the trial of Mike Sinden, 36, from Hove.
title: Jury discharged in ex-Sussex Police officer sexual assault case
title_page: Jury discharged in ex-Sussex Police officer sexual assault case - BBC News
maintext:
A jury has failed to reach a verdict and has been discharged in the trial of a former police inspector who was accused of sexual assault.
Former Sussex Police custody officer Mike Sinden, 36, of Hove, East Sussex, denies sexually assaulting a woman, who cannot be named for legal reasons, after drinking heavily on a night out in Eastbourne in March 2022.
The father-of-two denies pinning the woman to a wall in an alleyway and sexually assaulted her.
Mr Sinden also denies the charge of sexual assault by penetration.
